metadata.title: CVE-2014-8126 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - high
metadata.description:
The scheduler in HTCondor before 8.2.6 allows remote authenticated users toexecute arbitrary code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8126` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htcondor - 8.6.8~dfsg.1-2
libclassad8 - 8.6.8~dfsg.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: condor package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.6.8~dfsg.1-2').
